TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowServiceAttributes extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject
Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowServiceAttributes Inherits DependencyObject

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 建置工作流程服務所裝飾的服務行為。

span.span: Builds the service behavior for the workflow service that it decorates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] WorkflowServiceAttributes 類別用來定義 活動的服務屬性。The WorkflowServiceAttributes class is used to define service attributes for a activity. 其中某些屬性具有預設值，如下所示。Some of the attributes have default values, as shown below. ||| |-|-| |屬性Attribute|預設值Default Value| |AddressFilterModeAddressFilterMode|ExactExact| |IgnoreExtensionDataObjectIgnoreExtensionDataObject|FalseFalse| |IncludeExceptionDetailInFaultIncludeExceptionDetailInFault|FalseFalse| |MaxItemsInObjectGraphMaxItemsInObjectGraph|21474836472147483647| |UseSynchronizationContextUseSynchronizationContext|TrueTrue| |ValidateMustUnderstandValidateMustUnderstand|TrueTrue|

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定一般未處理的執行例外狀況 (要轉換為型別 的 )，並傳送為錯誤訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies that general unhandled execution exceptions are to be converted into a of type and sent as a fault message.

summary.span: 請只在開發期間將這個項目設定為 ，以針對服務進行疑難排解。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 中服務項目中的名稱屬性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the name attribute in the service element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
The value of the Name property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至 <`wsdl:service`> 匯出時的項目。This property corresponds to the <`wsdl:service`> element when exported. 預設值為 null。The default value is null. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `Name` 屬性。The following example demonstrates how to access the `Name` property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 中服務的目標命名空間值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the target namespace for the service in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).

value.span: 設定 Namespace 屬性的值。

span.span: The value of the Namespace property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會對應至值的`targetNamespace`屬性 <`wsdl:definitions`> 包含的項目 <`wsdl:service`> 匯出時的項目。This value corresponds to the value of the `targetNamespace` attribute for the <`wsdl:definitions`> element that contains the <`wsdl:service`> element when exported. 預設值為 null。The default value is null. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `Namespace` 屬性。The following example demonstrates how to access the `Namespace` property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseSynchronizationContext { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否使用目前的同步處理內容來選擇執行的執行緒。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution.

value.span: 如果所有對服務的呼叫都必須在 指定的執行緒上執行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if all calls to the service must run on the thread specified by the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `UseSynchronizationContext` 屬性。The following example demonstrates how to access the `UseSynchronizationContext` property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateMustUnderstand { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定系統或應用程式是否會強制執行 SOAP 標頭處理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP header processing.

value.span: 如果系統要執行 SOAP 標頭 處理，則為 ，否則為 ，表示應用程式會執行這項處理。

span.span: if the system is to perform SOAP header processing; otherwise , which indicates that the application performs this processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `ValidateMustUnderstand` 屬性。The following example demonstrates how to access the `ValidateMustUnderstand` property.
